ingredients: 2 cups persimmon pulp, 2 cups white sugar, 2  eggs, beaten, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 pinch salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1   +   1/2 cups buttermilk,   +   1/4 cup heavy cream, 1 tablespoon honey, 4 tablespoons butter, melted
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 4g 20%, Cholesterol 49mg 16%, Sodium 209mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 67g 24%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 45g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 26mg 131%, Calcium 76mg 6%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 200mg 4%
